raw_comment: In this graph, it seems to show that leaves fall at different times and even in the end spring comes faster for states in the southern part of the united states. Spring doesn't come at the same time for every state.
ace_sentences: This graph seems to show that leaves fall at different times.
This graph seems to show that spring comes faster in states in the southern part of the United States.
Spring does not come at the same time in every state.
